ISSUE.TITLE: Setting base url fail with error 400
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Bug Report ##### SUMMARY Whe have an internal dns with a domain like "org.les800" when i'm trying to set the base url of the tower host with something like "tower.org.les800", it fail with an error 400 and url not valid ##### ENVIRONMENT * AWX version: 8.0.0 * AWX install method: MrMee rpm * Ansible version: 2.8.6 * Operating System: CentOS 7.7 * Web Browser: Chrome latest ##### STEPS TO REPRODUCE try an url like http://tower.org.les800 in settings/system ##### EXPECTED RESULTS url for the base host set ##### ACTUAL RESULTS got url with the name of the server instead ##### ADDITIONAL INFORMATION <!-- Include any links to sosreport, database dumps, screenshots or other information. -->

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #5077 from mabashian/9541-cred-password-ask Fixes bug where cred password field was displaying ASK

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #5081 from ansible/ui_issue_10079 Allow edit fields to custom credential types
